citation.abstract: Physicists say they are now almost certain that the curious “Higgs-like particle” revealed last year at CERN is a Higgs boson…
citation.title: Definitely, maybe: evidence grows for positive ID of Higgs boson

blogs.title: Large Hadron Collider Is Back To Change Our Understanding Of The Universe … Again
blogs.summary:
Physics
    
    Photo credit:
  
       Gearing up for another run. Adam Warzawa/EPA   
The Large Hadron Collider (LHC) has just begun smashing particles together at higher energies than ever before. This marks the start of the second run of the world&rsq

blogs.title: The secrets to our universe might lie in this abandoned coal mine in South Dakota
blogs.summary: The Deep Underground Neutrino Experiment (DUNE) is being developed to study the most abundant yet elusive matter particle in the universe.

author.name: Forum:Blog
author.description: The official blog of the World Economic Forum, better known for the Annual Meeting in Davos, Switzerland.

news.title: Deep underground, scientists are hunting down the universe's most elusive particles
news.summary: This article was originally published on The Conversation. Read the original article.​ In an abandoned gold mine close to Deadwood, South Dakota, construction has started on what is arguably the world’s largest science experiment.
